A Modest Request.name: A Modest Request
A Modest Request.drop_text: Drops from map-tier Dominus or Malachai bosses, including from the [[Shaper's Realm]].

Akil's Prophecy.name: Akil's Prophecy
Akil's Prophecy.drop_text: Drops from completing a [[temporal incursion]] encounters after killing an [[architect]]. Also drop from Architects in maps affected by <span class="tc -magic"><span class="c-item-hoverbox"><span class="c-item-hoverbox__activator">[[File:Alva's Memory inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[Alva's Memory|Alva's Memory]]</span><span class="c-item-hoverbox__display"><span class="item-box -normal"><span class="header -single"><span class="symbol"></span>Alva's Memory<span class="symbol"></span></span><span class="item-stats"><span class="group tc -mod">Unmodifiable</span><span class="group tc -help">Right-click on this, then left click on a completed Map on your Atlas to apply this Memory.</span></span></span>[[File:Alva's Memory inventory icon.png|link=|alt=]]</span></span> of Reverse Incursion</span>.

Anarchy's Price.name: Anarchy's Price
Anarchy's Price.drop_text: This item can drop from [[Rogue Exiles]].

Auspicious Ambitions.name: Auspicious Ambitions
Auspicious Ambitions.drop_text: Drops from the regular and uber versions of [[Maven]], [[Exarch]], [[Eater]], and [[Uber Elder]].

Chasing Risk.name: Chasing Risk
Chasing Risk.drop_text: Drops from the Vaal Omnitect in areas of level 79 or greater.

Dark Temptation.name: Dark Temptation
Dark Temptation.drop_text: Can also drop from hidden chests in [[The Azurite Mine]].

Darker Half.name: Darker Half
Darker Half.drop_text: Drops when receiving Currency rewards from Delirium layers in maps (from Delirium Mirror or Delirium Orbs) and in [[Simulacrum]].

Disdain.name: Disdain
Disdain.drop_text: Can drop after completing any Maven's Invitation, including Quest ones.

Divine Beauty.name: Divine Beauty
Divine Beauty.drop_text: Note: drops from Merveil in both <span class="c-item-hoverbox"><span class="c-item-hoverbox__activator">[[File:Underground Sea Map (Affliction) inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[Underground Sea Map|Underground Sea Map]]</span><span class="c-item-hoverbox__display"><span class="item-box -normal"><span class="header -single"><span class="symbol"></span>Underground Sea Map<span class="symbol"></span></span><span class="item-stats"><span class="group ">Map Level: <em class="tc -value ">77</em><br>Map Tier: <em class="tc -value ">10</em><br><abbr title="When used in guild creation, this map can be used for the listed character">Guild Character</abbr>: <em class="tc -value ">q</em></span><span class="group tc -flavour">Silent stillness. The waters are<br>as cold as they are black.</span><span class="group tc -help">Travel to this Map by using it in a personal Map Device. Maps can only be used once.</span></span></span>[[File:Underground Sea Map (Affliction) inventory icon.png|link=|alt=]]</span></span> and <span class="c-item-hoverbox"><span class="c-item-hoverbox__activator">[[File:Maelström of Chaos inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[Maelström of Chaos|Maelström of Chaos]]</span><span class="c-item-hoverbox__display"><span class="item-box -unique"><span class="header -double"><span class="symbol"></span>Maelström of Chaos<br>Atoll Map<span class="symbol"></span></span><span class="item-stats"><span class="group ">Map Level: <em class="tc -value ">72</em><br>Map Tier: <em class="tc -value ">5</em><br><abbr title="When used in guild creation, this map can be used for the listed character">Guild Character</abbr>: <em class="tc -value ">Ç</em><br>Item Quantity: <em class="tc -mod ">+(40-60)%</em><br>Item Rarity: <em class="tc -mod ">+(200-400)%</em></span><span class="group tc -mod">Area has patches of Chilled Ground<br>20 patches with Ground Effect per 100 tiles (Hidden)<br>Ground Effect has a radius of 14 (Hidden)<br>Monsters deal 50% extra [[Physical Damage]] as Lightning<br>Monsters are Immune to randomly chosen Elemental Ailments or Stun<br>Monsters' Melee [[Attack|Attacks]] apply random Hexes on [[Hit]]<br>Monsters Reflect Hexes</span><span class="group tc -flavour">Whispers from a world apart<br>Speak my name beyond the tomb;<br>Bound within the Maelström's heart,<br>Will they grant me strength or doom?</span><span class="group tc -help">Travel to this Map by using it in a personal Map Device. Maps can only be used once.</span></span></span>[[File:Maelström of Chaos inventory icon.png|link=|alt=]]</span></span>.

Doedre's Madness.name: Doedre's Madness
Doedre's Madness.drop_text: [[Doedre Stamatis|Doedre]] or corresponding bosses in [[The Harvest (area)|The Harvest]], [[Doedre's Cesspool]], [[The Rotting Core]], <span class="c-item-hoverbox"><span class="c-item-hoverbox__activator">[[File:Phantasmagoria Map (Ancestor) inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[Phantasmagoria Map|Phantasmagoria Map]]</span><span class="c-item-hoverbox__display"><span class="item-box -normal"><span class="header -single"><span class="symbol"></span>Phantasmagoria Map<span class="symbol"></span></span><span class="item-stats"><span class="group ">Map Level: <em class="tc -value ">82</em><br>Map Tier: <em class="tc -value ">15</em><br><abbr title="When used in guild creation, this map can be used for the listed character">Guild Character</abbr>: <em class="tc -value ">o</em></span><span class="group tc -flavour">Every movement is watched,<br>recorded, remembered.</span><span class="group tc -help">Travel to this Map by using it in a personal Map Device. Maps can only be used once.</span></span></span>[[File:Phantasmagoria Map (Ancestor) inventory icon.png|link=|alt=]]</span></span>, <span class="c-item-hoverbox"><span class="c-item-hoverbox__activator">[[File:Core Map (Affliction) inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[Core Map|Core Map]]</span><span class="c-item-hoverbox__display"><span class="item-box -normal"><span class="header -single"><span class="symbol"></span>Core Map<span class="symbol"></span></span><span class="item-stats"><span class="group ">Map Level: <em class="tc -value ">69</em><br>Map Tier: <em class="tc -value ">2</em><br><abbr title="When used in guild creation, this map can be used for the listed character">Guild Character</abbr>: <em class="tc -value ">û</em></span><span class="group tc -flavour">Black monstrous bridges cross oily rivers,<br>leading nowhere. Nothing as it should be.</span><span class="group tc -help">Travel to this Map by using it in a personal Map Device. Maps can only be used once.</span></span></span>[[File:Core Map (Affliction) inventory icon.png|link=|alt=]]</span></span>, <span class="c-item-hoverbox"><span class="c-item-hoverbox__activator">[[File:Waste Pool Map (Affliction) inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[Waste Pool Map|Waste Pool Map]]</span><span class="c-item-hoverbox__display"><span class="item-box -normal"><span class="header -single"><span class="symbol"></span>Waste Pool Map<span class="symbol"></span></span><span class="item-stats"><span class="group ">Map Level: <em class="tc -value ">73</em><br>Map Tier: <em class="tc -value ">6</em><br><abbr title="When used in guild creation, this map can be used for the listed character">Guild Character</abbr>: <em class="tc -value ">_</em></span><span class="group tc -flavour">Verdant life blossoms<br>amidst death.</span><span class="group tc -help">Travel to this Map by using it in a personal Map Device. Maps can only be used once.</span></span></span>[[File:Waste Pool Map (Affliction) inventory icon.png|link=|alt=]]</span></span>, <span class="c-item-hoverbox"><span class="c-item-hoverbox__activator">[[File:Sepulchre Map (Affliction) inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[Sepulchre Map|Sepulchre Map]]</span><span class="c-item-hoverbox__display"><span class="item-box -normal"><span class="header -single"><span class="symbol"></span>Sepulchre Map<span class="symbol"></span></span><span class="item-stats"><span class="group ">Map Level: <em class="tc -value ">76</em><br>Map Tier: <em class="tc -value ">9</em><br><abbr title="When used in guild creation, this map can be used for the listed character">Guild Character</abbr>: <em class="tc -value ">Ÿ</em></span><span class="group tc -flavour">Lives come and go.<br>Only bones and dust remain.</span><span class="group tc -help">Travel to this Map by using it in a personal Map Device. Maps can only be used once.</span></span></span>[[File:Sepulchre Map (Affliction) inventory icon.png|link=|alt=]]</span></span> and <span class="c-item-hoverbox"><span class="c-item-hoverbox__activator">[[File:The Putrid Cloister inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[The Putrid Cloister|The Putrid Cloister]]</span><span class="c-item-hoverbox__display"><span class="item-box -unique"><span class="header -double"><span class="symbol"></span>The Putrid Cloister<br>Museum Map<span class="symbol"></span></span><span class="item-stats"><span class="group ">Map Level: <em class="tc -value ">79</em><br>Map Tier: <em class="tc -value ">12</em><br><abbr title="When used in guild creation, this map can be used for the listed character">Guild Character</abbr>: <em class="tc -value ">Õ</em><br>Item Quantity: <em class="tc -mod ">+90%</em><br>Item Rarity: <em class="tc -mod ">+45%</em></span><span class="group tc -mod">Players are Cursed with [[Vulnerability]]<br>Players are Cursed with [[Conductivity]]<br>Players are Cursed with [[Flammability]]<br>Players are Cursed with [[Frostbite]]<br>Players are Cursed with Despair<br>Unique Boss drops divination cards</span><span class="group tc -flavour">Please take out your blades,<br>your whips, and your spikes.<br>Class is now in session.</span><span class="group tc -help">Travel to this Map by using it in a personal Map Device. Maps can only be used once.</span></span></span>[[File:The Putrid Cloister inventory icon.png|link=|alt=]]</span></span>

Duality.name: Duality
Duality.drop_text: Drops from Architects in the [[Temple of Atzoatl]] (completed temple, not in Incursions).

Dying Light.name: Dying Light
Dying Light.drop_text: Can also drop from <span class="c-item-hoverbox"><span class="c-item-hoverbox__activator">[[File:Maven's Invitation The Feared inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[Maven's Invitation: The Feared|Maven's Invitation: The Feared]]</span><span class="c-item-hoverbox__display"><span class="item-box -normal"><span class="header -single"><span class="symbol"></span>Maven's Invitation: The Feared<span class="symbol"></span></span><span class="item-stats"><span class="group tc -mod"><span class="tc -default">The Maven must Witness:<br/>[[Cortex]],<br>[[Chayula's Domain]],<br>[[The Alluring Abyss]],<br>[[The Shaper's Realm]],<br>[[Absence of Value and Meaning]]</span><br>Modifiers to Item Quantity will affect the number of encounter rewards dropped</span><span class="group tc -flavour">For those who must not endure it,<br>there may be found a perverse joy <br>in watching the struggle for survival.</span><span class="group tc -help">Open portals to The Maven's Crucible by using this item in a personal Map Device.</span></span></span>[[File:Maven's Invitation The Feared inventory icon.png|link=|alt=]]</span></span>.

Eldritch Perfection.name: Eldritch Perfection
Eldritch Perfection.drop_text: Drops from eldritch monsters found in maps influenced by [[The Searing Exarch]] or [[The Eater of Worlds]].

Eternal Bonds.name: Eternal Bonds
Eternal Bonds.drop_text: Drops from Map Reward Chests in Heist Contracts and Blueprints

Ever-Changing.name: Ever-Changing
Ever-Changing.drop_text: Drops in maps opened via [[Kirac]] missions.

Fateful Meeting.name: Fateful Meeting
Fateful Meeting.drop_text: Drops from [[Vaal Flesh Merchant]], a monster which appears in Alva's [[temporal incursion]]s if you have the [[atlas passive skill]] [[Vaal Oligarchs]] allocated.

Gemcutter's Mercy.name: Gemcutter's Mercy
Gemcutter's Mercy.drop_text: Drops from Gem chests in the [[Azurite Mine]].

Guardian's Challenge.name: Guardian's Challenge
Guardian's Challenge.drop_text: Sold by [[Kirac]] for 3x <span class="c-item-hoverbox"><span class="c-item-hoverbox__activator">[[File:Cartographer's Chisel inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[Cartographer's Chisel|Cartographer's Chisel]]</span><span class="c-item-hoverbox__display"><span class="item-box -currency"><span class="header -single"><span class="symbol"></span>Cartographer's Chisel<span class="symbol"></span></span><span class="item-stats"><span class="group ">Stack Size: <em class="tc -value ">20</em></span><span class="group tc -mod">Improves the quality of a map</span><span class="group tc -help">Right click this item then left click a map to apply it. Has greater effect on lower-rarity maps. The maximum quality is 20%.</span></span></span>[[File:Cartographer's Chisel inventory icon.png|link=|alt=]]</span></span>.

Her Mask.name: Her Mask
Her Mask.drop_text: Drops from any map area. Has a <span class="hoverbox c-tooltip"><span class="hoverbox__activator c-tooltip__activator">maximum drop level restriction of 72 </span><span class="hoverbox__display c-tooltip__display">Equivalent to T5 maps,<br><span class="tc -magic">Magic</span> monsters in T4 maps,<br>or <span class="tc -rare">Rare</span>/<span class="tc -unique">Unique</span> monsters in T3 maps.</span></span>.

Hope.name: Hope
Hope.drop_text: Drops from any map area. Has a <span class="hoverbox c-tooltip"><span class="hoverbox__activator c-tooltip__activator">minimum drop level restriction of 68 </span><span class="hoverbox__display c-tooltip__display">Equivalent to <span class="tc -normal">Normal</span> monsters in T1 maps.</span></span> and a <span class="hoverbox c-tooltip"><span class="hoverbox__activator c-tooltip__activator">maximum drop level restriction of 68 </span><span class="hoverbox__display c-tooltip__display">Equivalent to <span class="tc -normal">Normal</span> monsters in T1 maps.</span></span>.

Humility.name: Humility
Humility.drop_text: Drops from any area with the "aqueduct_area" tag.

I See Brothers.name: I See Brothers
I See Brothers.drop_text: Appears to drop from maps with bosses with the "I_see_brothers_card" monster tag. Note that [[Puruna, the Challenger]] is the version found in <span class="c-item-hoverbox"><span class="c-item-hoverbox__activator">[[File:Atoll Map (Affliction) inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[Atoll Map|Atoll Map]]</span><span class="c-item-hoverbox__display"><span class="item-box -normal"><span class="header -single"><span class="symbol"></span>Atoll Map<span class="symbol"></span></span><span class="item-stats"><span class="group ">Map Level: <em class="tc -value ">72</em><br>Map Tier: <em class="tc -value ">5</em><br><abbr title="When used in guild creation, this map can be used for the listed character">Guild Character</abbr>: <em class="tc -value ">Í</em></span><span class="group tc -flavour">Time turns even the vicious<br>volcanoes to hollow shells.</span><span class="group tc -help">Travel to this Map by using it in a personal Map Device. Maps can only be used once.</span></span></span>[[File:Atoll Map (Affliction) inventory icon.png|link=|alt=]]</span></span>, not <span class="c-item-hoverbox"><span class="c-item-hoverbox__activator">[[File:Plateau Map (Affliction) inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[Plateau Map|Plateau Map]]</span><span class="c-item-hoverbox__display"><span class="item-box -normal"><span class="header -single"><span class="symbol"></span>Plateau Map<span class="symbol"></span></span><span class="item-stats"><span class="group ">Map Level: <em class="tc -value ">74</em><br>Map Tier: <em class="tc -value ">7</em></span><span class="group tc -flavour">Steep cliffs divide where the trees<br>may grow, and where they may not.</span><span class="group tc -help">Travel to this Map by using it in a personal Map Device. Maps can only be used once.</span></span></span>[[File:Plateau Map (Affliction) inventory icon.png|link=|alt=]]</span></span>.

Imperial Legacy.name: Imperial Legacy
Imperial Legacy.drop_text: This item can only drop in areas that use the 'Desert' tileset as listed in the acquisition table.

Lingering Remnants.name: Lingering Remnants
Lingering Remnants.drop_text: Drops from any map area. Has a <span class="hoverbox c-tooltip"><span class="hoverbox__activator c-tooltip__activator">minimum drop level restriction of 78 </span><span class="hoverbox__display c-tooltip__display">Equivalent to T11 maps,<br><span class="tc -magic">Magic</span> monsters in T10 maps,<br>or <span class="tc -rare">Rare</span>/<span class="tc -unique">Unique</span> monsters in T9 maps.</span></span>.

Lost Worlds.name: Lost Worlds
Lost Worlds.drop_text: Sold by [[Kirac]] for 1x <span class="c-item-hoverbox"><span class="c-item-hoverbox__activator">[[File:Orb of Chance inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[Orb of Chance|Orb of Chance]]</span><span class="c-item-hoverbox__display"><span class="item-box -currency"><span class="header -single"><span class="symbol"></span>Orb of Chance<span class="symbol"></span></span><span class="item-stats"><span class="group ">Stack Size: <em class="tc -value ">20</em></span><span class="group tc -mod">Upgrades a normal item to a random rarity</span><span class="group tc -help">Right click this item then left click a normal item to apply it.</span></span></span>[[File:Orb of Chance inventory icon.png|link=|alt=]]</span></span>.

Lucky Deck.name: Lucky Deck
Lucky Deck.drop_text: Drops from any map area. Has a <span class="hoverbox c-tooltip"><span class="hoverbox__activator c-tooltip__activator">minimum drop level restriction of 74 </span><span class="hoverbox__display c-tooltip__display">Equivalent to T7 maps,<br><span class="tc -magic">Magic</span> monsters in T6 maps,<br>or <span class="tc -rare">Rare</span>/<span class="tc -unique">Unique</span> monsters in T5 maps.</span></span> and a <span class="hoverbox c-tooltip"><span class="hoverbox__activator c-tooltip__activator">maximum drop level restriction of 74 </span><span class="hoverbox__display c-tooltip__display">Equivalent to T7 maps,<br><span class="tc -magic">Magic</span> monsters in T6 maps,<br>or <span class="tc -rare">Rare</span>/<span class="tc -unique">Unique</span> monsters in T5 maps.</span></span>.

Perfection.name: Perfection
Perfection.drop_text: Drops from the [[Guardians of the Void]].

Prejudice.name: Prejudice
Prejudice.drop_text: This card drops in [[Redeemer]]-influenced maps. Other sources of divination card, such as Legion encounter with divination card reward type, can bypass this restriction.

Prometheus' Armoury.name: Prometheus' Armoury
Prometheus' Armoury.drop_text: This item can be acquired from: [[Haku, Warmaster]] in any zone & any allegiance (T, R, F, or I)

Rain Tempter.name: Rain Tempter
Rain Tempter.drop_text: Has a <span class="hoverbox c-tooltip"><span class="hoverbox__activator c-tooltip__activator">maximum drop level restriction of 80 </span><span class="hoverbox__display c-tooltip__display">Equivalent to T13 maps,<br><span class="tc -magic">Magic</span> monsters in T12 maps,<br>or <span class="tc -rare">Rare</span>/<span class="tc -unique">Unique</span> monsters in T11 maps.</span></span>.

Remembrance.name: Remembrance
Remembrance.drop_text: Drops from "Light Jewellery" chests in the underground sections of [[Primeval Ruins]], [[Abyssal City]], and [[Vaal Outpost]] [[Delve]] nodes.

Sambodhi's Vow.name: Sambodhi's Vow
Sambodhi's Vow.drop_text: Can drop from members of the [[Immortal Syndicate]].

Society's Remorse.name: Society's Remorse
Society's Remorse.drop_text: Can drop from Voltaxic Sulphite deposits

The Apothecary.name: The Apothecary
The Apothecary.drop_text: Has a <span class="hoverbox c-tooltip"><span class="hoverbox__activator c-tooltip__activator">minimum drop level restriction of 75 </span><span class="hoverbox__display c-tooltip__display">Equivalent to T8 maps,<br><span class="tc -magic">Magic</span> monsters in T7 maps,<br>or <span class="tc -rare">Rare</span>/<span class="tc -unique">Unique</span> monsters in T6 maps.</span></span>.

The Archmage's Right Hand.name: The Archmage's Right Hand
The Archmage's Right Hand.drop_text: May be able to drop in other Breachstones.<sup class="noprint Inline-Template Template-Fact" style="white-space:nowrap;">&#91;<i><span title="This claim needs confirmation.">confirmation needed</span></i>&#93;</sup>

The Astromancer.name: The Astromancer
The Astromancer.drop_text: May also drop from Flesh Sculptor due to the "heist_science_miniboss_monster" tag. <sup class="noprint Inline-Template " style="white-space:nowrap;">&#91;<i>[[Wikipedia:Wikipedia:Citing sources|<span title="This statement appears to be based on conjecture">guesswork?</span>]]</i>&#93;</sup>

The Breach.name: The Breach
The Breach.drop_text: Drops from [[Null Portal]]s that spawn in Elder-Influenced maps.

The Cacophony.name: The Cacophony
The Cacophony.drop_text: Drops from Merveil, the Returned in both <span class="c-item-hoverbox"><span class="c-item-hoverbox__activator">[[File:Underground Sea Map (Affliction) inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[Underground Sea Map|Underground Sea Map]]</span><span class="c-item-hoverbox__display"><span class="item-box -normal"><span class="header -single"><span class="symbol"></span>Underground Sea Map<span class="symbol"></span></span><span class="item-stats"><span class="group ">Map Level: <em class="tc -value ">77</em><br>Map Tier: <em class="tc -value ">10</em><br><abbr title="When used in guild creation, this map can be used for the listed character">Guild Character</abbr>: <em class="tc -value ">q</em></span><span class="group tc -flavour">Silent stillness. The waters are<br>as cold as they are black.</span><span class="group tc -help">Travel to this Map by using it in a personal Map Device. Maps can only be used once.</span></span></span>[[File:Underground Sea Map (Affliction) inventory icon.png|link=|alt=]]</span></span> and <span class="c-item-hoverbox"><span class="c-item-hoverbox__activator">[[File:Maelström of Chaos inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[Maelström of Chaos|Maelström of Chaos]]</span><span class="c-item-hoverbox__display"><span class="item-box -unique"><span class="header -double"><span class="symbol"></span>Maelström of Chaos<br>Atoll Map<span class="symbol"></span></span><span class="item-stats"><span class="group ">Map Level: <em class="tc -value ">72</em><br>Map Tier: <em class="tc -value ">5</em><br><abbr title="When used in guild creation, this map can be used for the listed character">Guild Character</abbr>: <em class="tc -value ">Ç</em><br>Item Quantity: <em class="tc -mod ">+(40-60)%</em><br>Item Rarity: <em class="tc -mod ">+(200-400)%</em></span><span class="group tc -mod">Area has patches of Chilled Ground<br>20 patches with Ground Effect per 100 tiles (Hidden)<br>Ground Effect has a radius of 14 (Hidden)<br>Monsters deal 50% extra [[Physical Damage]] as Lightning<br>Monsters are Immune to randomly chosen Elemental Ailments or Stun<br>Monsters' Melee [[Attack|Attacks]] apply random Hexes on [[Hit]]<br>Monsters Reflect Hexes</span><span class="group tc -flavour">Whispers from a world apart<br>Speak my name beyond the tomb;<br>Bound within the Maelström's heart,<br>Will they grant me strength or doom?</span><span class="group tc -help">Travel to this Map by using it in a personal Map Device. Maps can only be used once.</span></span></span>[[File:Maelström of Chaos inventory icon.png|link=|alt=]]</span></span>.

The Calling.name: The Calling
The Calling.drop_text: The Calling can drop from [[Beyond demon]]s.

The Card Sharp.name: The Card Sharp
The Card Sharp.drop_text: Drops from completing a [[temporal incursion]] encounters after killing a corresponding [[Architect]]. Also drop from these Architects in maps affected by <span class="tc -magic"><span class="c-item-hoverbox"><span class="c-item-hoverbox__activator">[[File:Alva's Memory inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[Alva's Memory|Alva's Memory]]</span><span class="c-item-hoverbox__display"><span class="item-box -normal"><span class="header -single"><span class="symbol"></span>Alva's Memory<span class="symbol"></span></span><span class="item-stats"><span class="group tc -mod">Unmodifiable</span><span class="group tc -help">Right-click on this, then left click on a completed Map on your Atlas to apply this Memory.</span></span></span>[[File:Alva's Memory inventory icon.png|link=|alt=]]</span></span> of Reverse Incursion</span>.

The Cataclysm.name: The Cataclysm
The Cataclysm.drop_text: Drops in [[Vaal side area]]s. Has a <span class="hoverbox c-tooltip"><span class="hoverbox__activator c-tooltip__activator">minimum drop level restriction of 72 </span><span class="hoverbox__display c-tooltip__display">Equivalent to Vaal side areas found in T4 maps</span></span>.

The Chosen.name: The Chosen
The Chosen.drop_text: The Chosen can drop from Breach encounters such as in Clasped Hand

The Deep Ones.name: The Deep Ones
The Deep Ones.drop_text: Drops from [[Tsoagoth, The Brine King]] or corresponding bosses.

The Dragon's Heart.name: The Dragon's Heart
The Dragon's Heart.drop_text: Drops from any map area. Has a <span class="hoverbox c-tooltip"><span class="hoverbox__activator c-tooltip__activator">minimum drop level restriction of 78 </span><span class="hoverbox__display c-tooltip__display">Equivalent to T11 maps,<br><span class="tc -magic">Magic</span> monsters in T10 maps,<br>or <span class="tc -rare">Rare</span>/<span class="tc -unique">Unique</span> monsters in T9 maps.</span></span>.

The Emptiness.name: The Emptiness
The Emptiness.drop_text: Appears to drop in maps (unique maps?) with the [[Mysterious Barrels]] [[sextant]] modifier.

The Encroaching Darkness.name: The Encroaching Darkness
The Encroaching Darkness.drop_text: Drops from any map area. Has a <span class="hoverbox c-tooltip"><span class="hoverbox__activator c-tooltip__activator">minimum drop level restriction of 73 </span><span class="hoverbox__display c-tooltip__display">Equivalent to T6 maps,<br><span class="tc -magic">Magic</span> monsters in T5 maps,<br>or <span class="tc -rare">Rare</span>/<span class="tc -unique">Unique</span> monsters in T4 maps.</span></span>.

The Endless Darkness.name: The Endless Darkness
The Endless Darkness.drop_text: Drops from destroyed Harbinger Portals in [[The Beachhead]], <span class="c-item-hoverbox"><span class="c-item-hoverbox__activator">[[File:Infused Beachhead inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[Infused Beachhead|Infused Beachhead]]</span><span class="c-item-hoverbox__display"><span class="item-box -unique"><span class="header -double"><span class="symbol"></span>Infused Beachhead<br>Harbinger Map<span class="symbol"></span></span><span class="item-stats"><span class="group ">Map Level: <em class="tc -value ">83</em><br>Map Tier: <em class="tc -value ">16</em></span><span class="group tc -mod">100% more Monster [[Life]]<br>100% increased Monster Damage<br>Unique Boss drops an additional Harbinger Scroll<br>Area contains 20 additional Harbingers</span><span class="group tc -corrupted">Corrupted</span><span class="group tc -flavour"><span class="glyph HBGAa"></span><span class="glyph HBG01"></span><span class="glyph HBGAf"></span><span class="glyph HBG02"></span><span class="glyph HBGAm"></span><span class="glyph HBG03"></span><span class="glyph HBGAo"></span><br><span class="glyph HBG02"></span><span class="glyph HBGAt"></span><span class="glyph HBG03"></span><span class="glyph HBGAy"></span></span><span class="group tc -help">Travel to this Map by using it in a personal Map Device. Maps can only be used once.</span></span></span>[[File:Infused Beachhead inventory icon.png|link=|alt=]]</span></span>, or [[Delve]]. Also drops from Harbinger Portals in map affected by <span class="tc -magic"><span class="c-item-hoverbox"><span class="c-item-hoverbox__activator">[[File:Kirac's Memory inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[Kirac's Memory|Kirac's Memory]]</span><span class="c-item-hoverbox__display"><span class="item-box -normal"><span class="header -single"><span class="symbol"></span>Kirac's Memory<span class="symbol"></span></span><span class="item-stats"><span class="group tc -mod">Unmodifiable</span><span class="group tc -help">Right-click on this, then left click on a completed Map on your Atlas to apply this Memory.</span></span></span>[[File:Kirac's Memory inventory icon.png|link=|alt=]]</span></span> of Phaaryl</span>.

The Flora's Gift.name: The Flora's Gift
The Flora's Gift.drop_text: Has a <span class="hoverbox c-tooltip"><span class="hoverbox__activator c-tooltip__activator">maximum drop level restriction of 74-75 </span><span class="hoverbox__display c-tooltip__display">Equivalent to T8 maps,<br><span class="tc -magic">Magic</span> monsters in T7 maps,<br>or <span class="tc -rare">Rare</span>/<span class="tc -unique">Unique</span> monsters in T6 maps.</span></span>.<sup class="noprint Inline-Template Template-Fact" style="white-space:nowrap;">&#91;<i><span title="This claim needs confirmation.">confirmation needed</span></i>&#93;</sup>

The Fool.name: The Fool
The Fool.drop_text: Can drop from members of the [[Immortal Syndicate]].

The Gambler.name: The Gambler
The Gambler.drop_text: Can drop from any map area. Has a <span class="hoverbox c-tooltip"><span class="hoverbox__activator c-tooltip__activator">minimum drop level restriction of 68 </span><span class="hoverbox__display c-tooltip__display">Equivalent to T1 maps.</span></span>.

The Gladiator.name: The Gladiator
The Gladiator.drop_text: Drops from any area with the "pitfight_area" tag. Note the level requirement excludes Daresso's zones in Act 4.

The Greatest Intentions.name: The Greatest Intentions
The Greatest Intentions.drop_text: Drops in <span class="c-item-hoverbox"><span class="c-item-hoverbox__activator">[[File:Maven's Invitation The Feared inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[Maven's Invitation: The Feared|Maven's Invitation: The Feared]]</span><span class="c-item-hoverbox__display"><span class="item-box -normal"><span class="header -single"><span class="symbol"></span>Maven's Invitation: The Feared<span class="symbol"></span></span><span class="item-stats"><span class="group tc -mod"><span class="tc -default">The Maven must Witness:<br/>[[Cortex]],<br>[[Chayula's Domain]],<br>[[The Alluring Abyss]],<br>[[The Shaper's Realm]],<br>[[Absence of Value and Meaning]]</span><br>Modifiers to Item Quantity will affect the number of encounter rewards dropped</span><span class="group tc -flavour">For those who must not endure it,<br>there may be found a perverse joy <br>in watching the struggle for survival.</span><span class="group tc -help">Open portals to The Maven's Crucible by using this item in a personal Map Device.</span></span></span>[[File:Maven's Invitation The Feared inventory icon.png|link=|alt=]]</span></span>.

The Gulf.name: The Gulf
The Gulf.drop_text: Drops from Uber Elder only. It is unknown if this can drop from the Feared with a witnessed Uber Elder.

The Insane Cat.name: The Insane Cat
The Insane Cat.drop_text: Drops from [[Omniphobia]] and [[Kosis]] in map areas affected by [[Delirium]].

The Lion.name: The Lion
The Lion.drop_text: The card drop from [[The Dishonoured Queen]], the unique area boss of [[The Mud Flats]]; or [[The Vindicated Queen]], the sideboss of <span class="c-item-hoverbox"><span class="c-item-hoverbox__activator">[[File:Caldera Map (Affliction) inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[Caldera Map|Caldera Map]]</span><span class="c-item-hoverbox__display"><span class="item-box -normal"><span class="header -single"><span class="symbol"></span>Caldera Map<span class="symbol"></span></span><span class="item-stats"><span class="group ">Map Level: <em class="tc -value ">74</em><br>Map Tier: <em class="tc -value ">7</em><br><abbr title="When used in guild creation, this map can be used for the listed character">Guild Character</abbr>: <em class="tc -value ">ø</em></span><span class="group tc -flavour">From the heart of fire, rivers<br>of burning rage billow forth.</span><span class="group tc -help">Travel to this Map by using it in a personal Map Device. Maps can only be used once.</span></span></span>[[File:Caldera Map (Affliction) inventory icon.png|link=|alt=]]</span></span>.

The Long Con.name: The Long Con
The Long Con.drop_text: This card drops from [[Izaro's Treasure]] chests in [[the Eternal Labyrinth]] (Uber Lab) and [[Enriched Eternal Labyrinth]].

The Obscured.name: The Obscured
The Obscured.drop_text: The Obscured can drop from [[Abyss]] monsters, including from Abyss nodes in [[Delve]].

The Offering.name: The Offering
The Offering.drop_text: Drops from [[Shavronne of Umbra]] and her map boss variants.

The Porcupine.name: The Porcupine
The Porcupine.drop_text: May also drop from other maps which naturally spawn Porcupine Goliath mobs.

The Price of Protection.name: The Price of Protection
The Price of Protection.drop_text: Drops from [[Invasion boss]]es or [[Vaal side area]] bosses.

The Puzzle.name: The Puzzle
The Puzzle.drop_text: The Puzzle can drop from [[Beyond demon]]s.

The Realm.name: The Realm
The Realm.drop_text: Can drop from [[Breach monster]]s or [[Breachstone]]s, or from [[Kirac]]'s [[Divination Card]] master mission maps.

The Risk.name: The Risk
The Risk.drop_text: The Risk can drop from the following loot containers:<br>* [[Diviner's Strongbox]]<br>* [[The Lord's Labyrinth#Chests|Izaro's Treasure]] in the [[Endgame Labyrinth]]

The Rusted Bard.name: The Rusted Bard
The Rusted Bard.drop_text: Previously, the Iron Bard used to drop in <span class="c-item-hoverbox"><span class="c-item-hoverbox__activator">[[File:The Vinktar Square inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[The Vinktar Square|The Vinktar Square]]</span><span class="c-item-hoverbox__display"><span class="item-box -unique"><span class="header -double"><span class="symbol"></span>The Vinktar Square<br>Courtyard Map<span class="symbol"></span></span><span class="item-stats"><span class="group ">Map Level: <em class="tc -value ">72</em><br>Map Tier: <em class="tc -value ">5</em><br><abbr title="When used in guild creation, this map can be used for the listed character">Guild Character</abbr>: <em class="tc -value ">²</em><br>Item Quantity: <em class="tc -mod ">+(100-150)%</em><br>Item Rarity: <em class="tc -mod ">+(100-150)%</em><br>Monster Pack Size: <em class="tc -mod ">+(30-50)%</em></span><span class="group tc -mod">20% more Monster [[Life]]<br>(30-50)% increased Pack size<br>Monsters are Unaffected by [[Shock]]<br>20% increased Monster Damage<br>+35% Monster [[Lightning Resistance]]<br>Monsters deal 35% extra [[Physical Damage]] as Lightning</span><span class="group tc -flavour">To the east, <br>it cannot be seen.<br>To the west, <br>it cannot be touched.<br>To the south, <br>it cannot be remembered.<br>And to the north, <br>it cannot be contained.</span><span class="group tc -help">Travel to this Map by using it in a personal Map Device. Maps can only be used once.</span></span></span>[[File:The Vinktar Square inventory icon.png|link=|alt=]]</span></span>.<sup class="noprint Inline-Template Template-Fact" style="white-space:nowrap;">&#91;<i><span title="This claim needs confirmation.">confirmation needed</span></i>&#93;</sup>

The Scholar.name: The Scholar
The Scholar.drop_text: Drops from any area with the "library_area" tag.

The Shortcut.name: The Shortcut
The Shortcut.drop_text: Drops in [[Vaal side area]]s and [[Trials of Ascendancy|Labyrinth Trial areas]] of area level 80+.

The Trial.name: The Trial
The Trial.drop_text: Drops from any map area. Has a <span class="hoverbox c-tooltip"><span class="hoverbox__activator c-tooltip__activator">minimum drop level restriction of 73 </span><span class="hoverbox__display c-tooltip__display">Equivalent to T6 maps,<br><span class="tc -magic">Magic</span> monsters in T5 maps,<br>or <span class="tc -rare">Rare</span>/<span class="tc -unique">Unique</span> monsters in T4 maps.</span></span> and a <span class="hoverbox c-tooltip"><span class="hoverbox__activator c-tooltip__activator">maximum drop level restriction of 77 </span><span class="hoverbox__display c-tooltip__display">Equivalent to T10 maps,<br><span class="tc -magic">Magic</span> monsters in T9 maps,<br>or <span class="tc -rare">Rare</span>/<span class="tc -unique">Unique</span> monsters in T8 maps.</span></span>.

The Void.name: The Void
The Void.drop_text: Can also drop in <span class="c-item-hoverbox"><span class="c-item-hoverbox__activator">[[File:Park Map (Affliction) inventory icon.png|16x16px|link=|alt=]][[Park Map|Park Map]]</span><span class="c-item-hoverbox__display"><span class="item-box -normal"><span class="header -single"><span class="symbol"></span>Park Map<span class="symbol"></span></span><span class="item-stats"><span class="group ">Map Level: <em class="tc -value ">76</em><br>Map Tier: <em class="tc -value ">9</em><br><abbr title="When used in guild creation, this map can be used for the listed character">Guild Character</abbr>: <em class="tc -value ">÷</em></span><span class="group tc -flavour">A brief respite in a sea of obligation and uncertainty.</span><span class="group tc -help">Travel to this Map by using it in a personal Map Device. Maps can only be used once.</span></span></span>[[File:Park Map (Affliction) inventory icon.png|link=|alt=]]</span></span> during a Kirac mission.

The Wedding Gift.name: The Wedding Gift
The Wedding Gift.drop_text: May also drop from [[The Temple of Decay Level 2]] - please confirm on [https://discord.gg/jsN2gsDUyM Divcord].

The Wolf's Legacy.name: The Wolf's Legacy
The Wolf's Legacy.drop_text: This card drops from [[Izaro's Treasure]] chests, Labyrinth Troves, or Silver Key caches in the [[Eternal Labyrinth]] or [[Enriched Eternal Labyrinth]]. Still requires verification if it can drop in Merciless Labyrinth.

Three Voices.name: Three Voices
Three Voices.drop_text: Drops from any area with the "triple_boss_map" tag.

Time-Lost Relic.name: Time-Lost Relic
Time-Lost Relic.drop_text: Can be found in any areas generated by [[Expedition Logbook]]s, or [[Crystal Ore Map]], [[Dig Map]], [[Excavation Map]], [[Flooded Mine Map]], [[Geode Map]], or [[Grotto Map]]

Triskaidekaphobia.name: Triskaidekaphobia
Triskaidekaphobia.drop_text: Drops from [[Uber Atziri]] and [[Temple of Atzoatl]]'s Incursion Atziri encounter.

Underground Forest.name: Underground Forest
Underground Forest.drop_text: It drops in the Delve mines, in the Petrified Forest biome, behind fractured walls.

Unrequited Love.name: Unrequited Love
Unrequited Love.drop_text: May also from other vaal_pyramid_map tagged areas <sup class="noprint Inline-Template " style="white-space:nowrap;">&#91;<i>[[Wikipedia:Wikipedia:Citing sources|<span title="This statement appears to be based on conjecture">guesswork?</span>]]</i>&#93;</sup>

Vanity.name: Vanity
Vanity.drop_text: Drops from [[Vaal Vessel]]s in [[Vaal side area]]s.

Who Asked.name: Who Asked
Who Asked.drop_text: May drop from other "Forge_Area" tag maps.
